**Safety & Control of Information and Devices Competence** encompasses protecting devices and personal information: using security measures, managing privacy settings, identifying phishing, and controlling what information is shared online.

```{r setup}

#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load required libraries
library(dashboardr)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data from dataset_4014obs.rds
data <- readRDS('dataset_4014obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

# Create filtered datasets
# Each filter is applied once and reused across visualizations

data_filtered_984a0efe <- data %>% dplyr::filter(wave == 1)
data_filtered_4af682fd <- data %>% dplyr::filter(wave == 2)

```
